title: Thistil Mistil Kistil Volume One
description: Coal is dead.He wouldn’t mind so much if he hadn’t been rejected from Valhalla by Odin himself. Before he can take his rightful place among Asgard’s best warriors, he must find the missing pieces of three weapons belonging to the gods.And who’s responsible for these missing pieces? The trickster Loki, of course. With Loki’s help, Coal hopes to find these missing pieces quickly and easily.That’s only if Loki truly plans to help him.
author: Sarah Schanze
